name: Hooligan Vasja: Christmas
description: Our hero wears a Christmas hat and is armed with snowballs because only he can defeat the villains. Fight against evil and bring back the holiday to children, after all, hooligan Vasja has a good heart.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 1.5GHz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: onboard video with 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 80 MB available space
